name: Through Fire and Flood
flavor_text: The passage to the Shore is not an easy road.

frame.name: Adaptive Frame
frame.description: A well-rounded grip, reliable and sturdy.

perks.description:
This weapon is optimized for an especially explosive payload.
  •  Greatly increases blast radius
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
  •  Slightly decreases projectile speed
perks.name: Volatile Launch

perks.description:
This weapon's launch parameters are particularly stable.
  •  Greatly increases stability
  •  Increases blast radius
  •  Decreases projectile speed
perks.name: Confined Launch

perks.description:
This weapon is weighted for vertical recoil.
  •  Greatly controls recoil
  •  Increases stability
  •  Increases handling speed
perks.name: Countermass

perks.description:
This weapon's launch barrel is optimized for projectile speed.
  •  Greatly increases projectile speed
  •  Decreases stability
  •  Slightly decreases blast radius
perks.name: Hard Launch

perks.description:
This weapon's launch barrel is well-balanced.
  •  Slightly increases projectile speed
  •  Slightly increases blast radius
  •  Slightly increases stability
perks.name: Linear Compensator

perks.description:
This weapon's barrel provides faster projectiles and much faster aiming.
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Increases projectile speed
perks.name: Quick Launch

perks.description:
This barrel is broadly optimized for firing control.
  •  Moderately controls recoil
  •  Increases stability
  •  Increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases projectile speed
perks.name: Smart Drift Control

perks.description:
Grenades fired from this weapon bounce further. 
  •  Increases stability 
  •  Increases projectile speed
perks.name: Thermoplastic Grenades

perks.description: Grenades fired from this weapon have increased proximity detection but a decreased blast radius.
perks.name: Proximity Grenades

perks.description:
Grenades fired from this weapon do increased damage on direct hits.
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Spike Grenades

perks.description:
Reduces weight for faster reloads.
  •  Greatly increases reload speed
  •  Decreases stability
perks.name: Alloy Casing

perks.description:
Heavy, high capacity drum.
  •  Greatly increases magazine size
  •  Greatly decreases reload speed
perks.name: Augmented Drum

perks.description:
This weapon's projectiles are larger and travel faster.
  •  Increases blast radius
  •  Slightly increases projectile speed
  •  Decreases magazine size
perks.name: High-Explosive Ordnance

perks.description:
This weapon's projectiles are particularly light and quick.
  •  Increases projectile speed
  •  Increases reload speed
perks.name: High-Velocity Rounds

perks.description:
Grenades are smaller and more compact for easier reloading.
  •  Increases magazine size
  •  Increases reload speed
  •  Decreases blast radius
perks.name: Mini Frags

perks.description: Grenades fired from this weapon attach on impact and detonate when enemies are in proximity.
perks.name: Sticky Grenades

perks.description: Aiming this weapon increases its effective range and zoom magnification. Increased projectile velocity while aiming Rocket Launchers, Grenade Launchers, and Bows.
perks.name: Rangefinder

perks.description: Increased ammo reserves. Faster reload, stow, and ready when you're crouching.
perks.name: Field Prep

perks.description: The holstered weapon is automatically reloaded after a short period of time.
perks.name: Auto-Loading Holster

perks.description: Faster time to aim down sights.
perks.name: Snapshot Sights

perks.description: Increased reload, stability, and handling when enemies are in close proximity.
perks.name: Threat Detector

perks.description: Breaking a combatant's shield with this weapon fills its magazine from reserves. Energy weapons regenerate ammo on hit when matching the damage type to the combatant's shield.
perks.name: Genesis

perks.description: Overflows the magazine based on the number of rapid kills before reloading.
perks.name: Ambitious Assassin

perks.description: Kills with this weapon temporarily grant increased damage. Stacks 3x.
perks.name: Rampage

perks.description: This weapon can be drawn unbelievably fast.
perks.name: Quickdraw
